amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce each amount made available by this Act (other than an amount required to be made available by a provision of law) by 1 percent.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 261 (Roll no. 335).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A033) Failed by recorded vote: 157 - 261 (Roll no. 335).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A033) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
